name: Piecework by Employee
query:
SELECT  a.employee_name AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
        IF(spe.task is null,"Single","Group") as "Test:Data:200",
        IFNULL(spe.task,p.task, spe.task) AS "Task:Data:200",
        IFNULL(spe.task_rate,p.task_rate,spe.task_rate) as "Rate:Currency:150",
        IFNULL(spe.quantity,p.quantity,spe.quantity) as "Qty:Interger:150",
        SUM(a.amount) AS "Gross:Currency:150"
FROM `tabAdditional Salary` a LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON a.employee = e.name
                              LEFT JOIN `tabSingle Piecework Employees` spe ON a.name = spe.additional_salary
                              LEFT JOIN `tabPiecework Payment Allocation` ppa ON a.name = ppa.additional_salary
                              LEFT JOIN `tabPiecework` p on p.name = ppa.parent
WHERE a.payroll_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
AND a.salary_component = 'Piecework'
GROUP BY a.employee,  IFNULL(spe.task,p.task, spe.task) WITH ROLLUP
